*   **Notice URL (French)**: Réfèrez-vous à https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/87efe769bf2bd68d1ddb7a9fc838a19b/n23-19730_-_npp_fre.pdf pour le texte complétement du l'avis.

**Tender Description (English)**

The Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council of Canada's Future Challenges Division requires professional facilitation services for a workshop that will bring together up to 40 researchers from the Canadian research community and up to five SSHRC staff members and other federal partners of this activity. The workshop will be conducted as follows: a three-day in-person meeting in Ottawa and a three-day virtual meeting for all participants
